About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Kelvin Enumah is an incorporated Engineer (IEng) of the Engineering Council UK (ECUK) and a member of the Energy Institute (EI). Kelvin holds an Affiliateshipand level 5 award in Engineering from the City and Guilds of London Institute, he is also a certified City and Guilds competency/learning assessor. Kelvin bridges sides due to his acquired family of competencies.
